name: ajgon/lint-pack
description: Various linters for your Symfony2 project

suggest.squizlabs/php_codesniffer: Set lint_pack.phpcs.bin = bin/phpcs and you have embeded phpcs out of the box
suggest.phpmd/phpmd: Set lint_pack.phpmd.bin = bin/phpmd and you have embeded phpmd out of the box
suggest.sebastian/phpcpd: Set lint_pack.phpcpd.bin = bin/phpcpd and you have embeded phpcpd out of the box
